attributes.action: Suspend the Bailiffs (Licensing) Bill 2006-07 Until Proper Regulation of the Industry is Already in Place.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the abuses already being committed by the debt collection industry we would like to see proper regulation of this industry sector BEFORE they are given further powers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
